eProsima Fast RTPS API Reference » RTPS » Network Module

Flow Controllers take a vector of cache changes (by reference) and return a filtered vector, with a collection of changes this filter considers valid for sending, ordered by its subjective priority. More...

Detailed Description

Flow Controllers take a vector of cache changes (by reference) and return a filtered vector, with a collection of changes this filter considers valid for sending, ordered by its subjective priority.
